main_definition: The main definition of 'general' is a military rank or the leader in charge, but it can also be used as an adjective to describe something as overall, widespread, or lacking specificity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to a high-ranking military officer
meanings_and_examples.example: The general led his troops into battle with great courage.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to something widespread or affecting all
meanings_and_examples.example: A general flu season affected many people in the city this year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not specific; pertaining to a class, group, or category as a whole without exception
meanings_and_examples.example: The store offers a general sale on all items for one day only.
